'''Realms alpha build 1'''<ref>{{tweet|jeb|720246827598094336|Minecraft Realms is coming to MC:PE and Win 10! http://www.mojang.com/2016/04/were-working-on-minecraft-realms-for-pocket-and-win-10/ Alpha test starting now on Android!}}</ref><ref>{{citation|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160416132413/http://mojang.com/2016/04/were-working-on-minecraft-realms-for-pocket-and-win-10|title=Minecraft Realms is coming to Pocket and Win 10|website=[[mojang.com]]}}</ref> is the first build version released for the Realms phase of [[Pocket Edition v0.15.0 alpha|v0.15.0 alpha]]. Unlike the other first builds of a major update, where most of the planned stuff is added in, this build is for the [[Realms]] phase of 0.15, the major stuff will come "soon!".<ref name="0.15 Part 1">{{tweet|_tomcc|720357870727012356|People, the 0.15 Alpha is just for Realms, there are no 0.15 features like Pistons! They will come later :)}}</ref>

== Additions ==
'''[[Realms]]<ref name="0.15 Part 1"/><ref name="realms">{{tweet|tomcc_|720247291630628864|We just released Realms MCPE Alpha on Android, it will be free for a while for anyone that helps us test it :)}}</ref>'''
* Requires logging in to Microsoft Xbox Live account.
* Free until the full release of v0.15.0.<ref name="realms"/>

'''[[Title screen]]'''

** Replaces the old '''Options''' button.
* '''Options''' button
** Is now an icon
*** Beside the '''Languages''' icon.

'''Title screen'''
